content:
I have been using the 'Mathematics in lean' textbook for a while now, and haven't been facing any technical problems with it so far. But all of a sudden today it considers the first import in every .lean file as an error, saying "unknown package 'Mathlib'". Can anyone suggest a fix for this?
image.png
You need to open the right folder in vscode using the File > Open folder menu to open the folder my_maths_in_lean rather than Lean projects in your case
Got it, thanks a lot :+1:
Vivek Rajesh Joshi has marked this topic as resolved.
